seo.title: Security and Privacy - CeroCloud (AES-256)
seo.description: Your data, your property. Discover how CeroCloud protects your business with AES-256 encryption, local database (SQLite), and 100% offline operation.
seo.keywords: pos data security, aes-256 encryption, secure local software, business privacy, no cloud, offline first
seo.og_description: Forget about cloud security breaches. CeroCloud keeps your data encrypted and local.
seo.og_image_alt: CeroCloud Security - AES-256 Encryption and Local Database

hero.subtitle: In an era where everything is in the cloud, we give you the power back. CeroCloud is designed from scratch with data privacy and sovereignty as absolute priorities.

encryption.title: AES-256 Military Encryption
encryption.description: Your backups are not simple files. We use the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) 256-bit to ensure only you have access to your critical information.

database.title: Local SQLite Database
database.description: Forget slow or vulnerable external servers. Your data lives on your hard drive, optimized with SQLite and WAL mode for instant performance.

offline.title: Offline-First Architecture
offline.description: CeroCloud does not need internet to work. If the network goes down, your business keeps operating without interruptions. Zero external dependencies.

ownership.title: Total Ownership
ownership.description: No hidden 'Terms of Service' about your data usage. You are the sole owner and administrator of your database and your customers.

q1.question: Is it really free for my business?
q1.answer: Absolutely. Whether you are a small entrepreneur or a company with 500 employees, you can use CeroCloud internally without paying a dime, forever.

q2.question: Can I hire someone to add features?
q2.answer: Yes. You can pay a developer to modify YOUR version of CeroCloud for internal use. What that developer cannot do is sell that modified version to others.

q3.question: Why use this license and not pure MIT?
q3.answer: We want to guarantee that CeroCloud remains free for end users and prevent third-party companies from appropriating community work to sell it.

disclaimer.title: No Warranty (AS IS)
disclaimer.text: The software is provided "as is", without warranty of any kind. The authors are not responsible for damages or data loss. We strongly recommend making frequent backups of your information using our backup tool.
